amendment.description: Amendment requires any mitigation of agricultural lands to be developed in consultation with the Secretary of Agriculture.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (offered as a replacement for the amendment printed in as amendment No. 61 in the Congressional Record of May 10) providing that any mitigation requirement of agricultural lands be developed in consultation with the Secretary of Agriculture.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Minge amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
